title: ADS Tech DVDXpressDX2 Driver FIX
description:
-----------------FIX FOR LACK OF SUPPORT FOR DVD XPRESS DX2 USB CAPTURE DEVICE-------


This is Will make the DVDXpressDX2 Hardware work on Windows 7 and Windows 8.1
It is a Virtualbox Image of a Complete working XP System with everything pre-installed and ready to go. Including a shared folder to export the movies captured.

I got a great Frame Rate on an AMD Dual Core 2.8 GHZ and 4GB RAM ...

As you know the Company who made this awesome hardware based Encoder is out of business so their is no driver support at all but if you want to capture some old movies or use this USB Capture Deivce in Windows 8, 8.1 or 7 Here is your Soultion
Complete with Instructions.

Again this is for The DVDXpressDX2 from ADS Tech.

Tested and works fine.

Let me Know



Crazy Joe.

If you don't have a DX2 you can fuck around with windows XP...

:0

L8r
